result.execSummary:
The defendant Jacob A. Vandenberg was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess w/ Intent-THC(>200-1000g), a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1m)(h)2.
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Paid. Bond applied.  Balance of bond to be returned to poster.

The Defendant is to undergo any counseling the agent finds appropriate and must comply with any recommended treatment/assessment/counseling.  Defendant may not withdraw from any ordered program without permission of the agent and/or provider.  Defendant is to comply with any recommendations of his doctor or psychologist regarding his A.D.D. and take all prescribed medication as prescribed.  The Defendant must obtain and maintain full-time employment/educational programming or a combination of both as recommended.  The Defendant is to maintain absolute sobriety - no alcohol or drugs unless prescribed by a physician.  The Defendant is not to go into any bars, taverns or businesses where the primary purpose is to sell alcohol.  The Defendant is to have no contact with R.A. or known drug dealers.   The Defendant is to provide a biological specimen for DNA analysis.   Court orders expungement per Wisconsin Statute #973.015, upon successful completion of probation, no further violations of the criminal law for 12 years, and application to the court.

timeConds.notes: Stayed - to be used by Agent with Court approval.
Total with 15CM922.  To be completed within the first 18 months of probation.
